What's KuCoin?

KuCoin is a global cryptocurrency exchange known for its wide selection of digital assets, advanced trading tools, and strong security features.

  • Spot and advanced trading
  • Competitive fees
  • Robust security measures
  • User-friendly experience

API Key Setup Process

Follow the steps below to create and configure your API keys for KuCoin.

{% include 'include/warnings.html' with warning='Never share your API keys with anyone. We use industry-standard encryption to secure your credentials.' %}

1 Create a KuCoin Account

If you don’t already have a KuCoin account, please sign up here.

2 Navigate to API Management

  1. Log in to your KuCoin account.
  2. Click on your profile icon in the upper right and select API Management.
  3. Click Create API.

3 Configure Your API Key

  1. Enter a name for the API (e.g., “My Trading Bot”).
  2. Create an API passphrase and store it securely—you will need it later.
  3. Select the required permissions (e.g., General, Trade).

4 Enable Security and Whitelist IP

  1. Set up IP whitelisting for added protection.
  2. Complete 2FA and any other required verification.
  3. Click Confirm to generate your API Key and Secret.

Complete the Integration

Copy the API Key, Secret, and Passphrase, then input them into your Etradingview dashboard. Keep them secure and do not share them.
